data.price: Na wale wanao sema: Mola wetu Mlezi! Tuondolee adhabu ya Jahannamu. Hakika adhabu yake ikimpata mtu haimwachi.
data.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا ٱصۡرِفۡ عَنَّا عَذَابَ جَهَنَّمَۖ إِنَّ عَذَابَهَا كَانَ غَرَامًا
data.footnotes: Na wale ambao khofu yao inashinda matarajio - nao ndio mwendo wa wachamngu. Basi wanaikhofu adhabu ya Akhera, na hawaachi kumwomba Mwenyezi Mungu awaepusha na adhabu ya Jahannamu. Kwani adhabu yake ikimteremkia mkosefu inamganda, wala haimwachi.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna yaqūlūna rabbanā iṣ'rif ʿannā ʿadhāba jahannama inna ʿadhābahā kāna gharāman

data.price: Hakika hiyo ni kituo na makao mabaya.
data.footnotes: Na hakika Jahannamu ni kituo kiovu mno kwa mwenye kutua, na makao maovu kwa mwenye kukaa ndani yake.

dua.name: Dua for Guidance in Confusion
dua.significanceReason: Seeks divine guidance during periods of spiritual and personal confusion, asking for clarity and illumination of the path.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
